TextView.android:text: Select an package
Shirdi Flight Packages From Chennai - 1 Days
Departure at 03.30 a.m./05.15 a.m from Chennai Airport.
Arrival 6.50 a.m at Pune Airport.
Cab will start at Pune airport by 07.00 a.m and reaching Shirdi at 11.00 a.m.

At 11.30.a.m. Dharshan(V.I.P) of Saibaba Temple and other places of 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
SaiMuseum, 
Chavadi, 
Lendi Garden.
Starting from Shirdi at 4.00 p.m.
Reaching Pune Airport by 9.00 p.m.
Boarding Flight at Pune Airport by 11.00 p.m
Reaching Chennai Airport at 12.40 a.m.
Shirdi Flight Packages From Chennai - 2 Days
Departure from Chennai Airport at 5.15 a.m.
Arrival 6.50 a.m at Pune Airport.
Bus will start from Pune Airport by 7.00 a.m and reaching Shirdi 1.00 p.m.
Next 3 hours refreshment at hotel.
Evening 4.00 p.m visit Sai baba Temple.

Visit the places of 
Dwarakamai, 
Sai Museum, 
Lendi Garden, 
Chavadi.
Night halt at Shirdi.
Morning darshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple.
Starting from Shirdi by 9.00 a.m and visiting Three temples on the way.

Three temples are:
 1. Renukadevi Temple.
 2. Shani singnapur.
 3. Maha Ganapathy Temple.
Reach Pune Airport by 9.00 p.m.
Boarding flight at Pune Airport by 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 00.40 a.m.
Shirdi Flight Packages From Chennai Via Mumbai - 2 Days
Departure at 5.20 a.m from Chennai Airport.
Arrival 7.05 a.m at Mumbai Airport.
Bus will start at Mumbai airport by 07.30 a.m and on the way visiting 2 Temples.
Two Temples are Siddhi Vinayagar and Mahalakshmi Temple
Reaching Shirdi at 06.00 p.m.

Evening darshan of Saibaba Temple and other places of 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
Museum, 
Chavadi, 
Lendi Garden.
Night halt at Shirdi.
Morning darshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple.
Starting from Shirdi at 10.00 a.m and on the way visiting two Temples

Two Temples are
Shanisignapoor
Mahaganapathy Temple
Reaching Pune Airport by 9.00 p.m.
Boarding Flight at Pune Airport by 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 12.40 a.m.
Shirdi Pandharpur Flight Packages From Chennai - 3 Days
Departure at 5.15 a.m from Chennai Airport.
Arrival 06.50 a.m at Pune Airport.
Cab will start from Pune airport by 7.00 a.m, reaching Shirdi at 01.00p.m.
Next 3 hours refreshment at hotel.
Evening dharshan of Sai baba Temple at 4.00p.m.

Visit the places of 
Dwarakamai, 
Sai Museum, 
Chavadi, 
Lendi Garden.
Night halt at Shirdi.
Morning darshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple.
Starting from at 08.00 a.m and drive to Pandharpur and on the way visiting two temples.

Two temples are:
1. Renukadevi Temple.
2. Shani Shingnapur.
 Reaching Pandharpur at 05.00 p.m.
Evening dharshan of Pandurangar Temple at 7.00 p.m.
Night halt at Pandharpur.
Morning having the dharshan of Lord Pandurangar.
Free time of religious activities.
Starting from 09.00 a.m.on the way, visiting \nChinthamani Ganapathi Temple
Reaching Pune Airport by 8.00 p.m.
Boarding flight at Pune Airport by 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 00.50 a.m.
Shirdi Nasik Flight Package From Chennai - 3 Days
Departure at 5.15 a.m from Chennai Airport.
Arrival 6.50 a.m at Pune Airport.
Car will start at Pune Airport by 7.00 a.m and reaching Shirdi at 12.00 p.m.
Next 3 hours refreshment at hotel.

Evening dharshan of Saibaba temple and visit 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
Museum, 
Chavadi and 
Lendi Garden.
Night halt at Shirdi.
Morning darshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple.
Starting at Shirdi by 9.00 a.m and drive to Nasik.
Having dharshan of Thriyambakeshwar Temple (Jyothirlingam)

Visit the places of 
Panchavati, 
Kapaleshwar Temple, 
Kalaram and Goraram Temple and 
Sita Guha.
Evening return to Shirdi and night halt.
Starting from Shirdi at 9.00 am and on the way to Pune visiting three temples.

Three Temples are:
 1. Renukadevi Temple.
 2. Shani singnapur.
 3. Maha Ganapathy Temple.
Reaching Pune Airport by 9.00 p.m.
Boarding flight at Pune Airport by 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 00.40 a.m.
Shirdi Train/Flight Package From Chennai - 3 Days
Departure from Chennai Central Railway station -
Train No.11028 by Mumbai mail at 10:50 p.m.
Reaching Pune Railway station.at 11.30 p.m.
Bus/Cab will start at Pune railway station by 11.45 p.m. and reaching Shirdi at 05.00 a.m.
Refreshment at hotel for 2 hours.

Morning darshan of Saibaba Temple and other places of 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
Sai Museum, 
Chavadi, 
Lendi Garden.
Night Halt at Shirdi.
Morning darshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple.

Starting from Shirdi at 9.00 a.m and on the way visiting 
Shanisignapoor, 
Renuka Devi and 
Maha Ganapathi Temple.
Reaching Pune Airport by 9.00 p.m.
Boarding Flight at Pune Airport by 11.50 p.m. and reaching Chennai at 01.30 a.m.
Shirdi And Jyotrilingam Package From Chennai - 4 Days
Departure at 5.15 a.m at Chennai Airport.
Arrival 6.50 a.m. at Pune Airport.
Bus/Cab will start at Pune Airport by 7.00 am and on the way visiting Shanisignapoor and reaching Shirdi at 4.00 p.m.
Refreshment at hotel for 1 hour.

Having the darshan of Saibaba and visit the places of 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
Chavadi, 
Sai Museum and 
Lendi Garden.

 Night halt at Shirdi.
Starting at Shirdi by 9.00 a.m. drive to Nasik.
Having the darshan of Thriyambakeshwar Temple (One of the Jyothirlingam).

Visit the places of 
Panchavati, 
Kapaleshwar temple, 
Kalaram and Goraram Temple and Sita Guha.
Evening return to Shirdi and night halt.
Morning 7.00 a.m. drive to Aurangabad.
Having darshan of Grishneshwar Temple (One of the Jyothirlingam).
Return and night halt at Shirdi.
Starting at Shirdi by 8.00 a.m. Having darshan of Bhimashankar.
Reaching Pune Airport by 8.00 p.m.
Boarding flight at Pune Airport 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 12.45 a.m.
Shirdi Ajantha Ellora Package From Chennai - 4 Days
Departure at 5.15 a.m at Chennai Airport.
Arrival 6.50 a.m. at Pune Airport.
Bus/Cab will start at Pune Airport by 7.00 am and on the way visiting Shanisignapoor and reaching Shirdi at 4.00 p.m.
Refreshment at hotel for 1 hour.

Having the darshan of Saibaba and visit the places of 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
Chavadi, 
Sai Museum, 
Lendi Garden.
Night halt at Shirdi.
Starting at Shirdi by 9.00 a.m drive to Nasik and having the darshan of Triyambakeshwar Temple (One of the Jyothirlingam).

Visit the places of 
Panchavati, 
Kapaleshwar temple, 
Kalaram and 
Goraram Temple and Sita Guha.
Evening return to Shirdi and night halt.
Morning dharshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple and drive to Aurangabad.
Visit the place of Ajanta Caves.
Return and night halt at Aurangabad.
Starting at Aurangabad by 8.00 a.m. and drive to Ellora Caves.
After visit the caves and visit other places of Mini Tajmahal and Grineshwar Temple (one of the Jyothirlingam) drive to Pune.
Reaching Pune Airport by 8.00 p.m.
Boarding flight at Pune Airport 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 12.45 a.m.
Shirdi And Lonavala Package From Chennai - 3 Days
Departure at 5.15 a.m from Chennai Airport.
Arrival 06.50 a.m at Pune Airport.
Bus/Cab will start at Pune Airport by 07.00 a.m. and drive to Shirdi.
Reaching Shirdi at 1.00 p.m.

Evening darshan of Saibaba Temple and visit other places of 
Gurusthan, 
Dwarakamai, 
Sai Museum, 
Chavadi, 
Lendi Garden.
Night halt at Shirdi.
Morning dharshan / Kakada Aarti of Saibaba Temple.
Starting at Shirdi by 10.00 a.m. and drive to Lonavala on the way visiting Shanisignapoor and Maha Ganapathy Temple.
Reaching 5.00 p.m. at Lonavala.
Evening having sightseeing at Sunset Point.
Night halt at Hotel in Lonavala.

Morning having sightseeing of 
Karla Caves, 
Celebrity Wax Museum, 
Lion Point, 
Bhaja Caves, 
Rajmachi Fort, 
Tiger Leap and 
Shooting Point.
Starting at Lonavala by 06.00 p.m.
Reaching Pune Airport by 09.00 p.m.
Boarding flight at Pune Airport by 11.00 p.m.
Reaching Chennai Airport at 12.45 a.m.
